mapper.insert: insert into iov_road_label (road_label_id, road_label_name, label_deep, label_sort, start_point_name, end_point_name, remark, community_code, clean_level, line_options, purling_count, sweep_count, dedust_count, purling_direction, sweep_direction, dedust_direction, road_length, road_width, road_area, create_time, modify_time, delete_status) values (#{roadLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roadLabelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelDeep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{labelSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startPointName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endPointName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communityCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cleanLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lineOptions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purlingCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sweepCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dedustCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purlingDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sweepDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dedustDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roadLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{roadWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{roadArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update iov_road_label set road_label_name = #{roadLabelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, label_deep = #{labelDeep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, label_sort = #{labelSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_point_name = #{startPointName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_point_name = #{endPointName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_code = #{communityCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, clean_level = #{cleanLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, line_options = #{lineOptions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purling_count = #{purlingCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sweep_count = #{sweepCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dedust_count = #{dedustCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purling_direction = #{purlingDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sweep_direction = #{sweepDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dedust_direction = #{dedustDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, road_length = #{roadLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, road_width = #{roadWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, road_area = #{roadArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT} where road_label_id = #{roadLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select road_label_id, road_label_name, label_deep, label_sort, start_point_name, end_point_name, remark, community_code, clean_level, line_options, purling_count, sweep_count, dedust_count, purling_direction, sweep_direction, dedust_direction, road_length, road_width, road_area, create_time, modify_time, delete_status from iov_road_label where road_label_id = #{roadLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
